45295 47172 Okay, just give me

50258 51676 Okay, I'm going
to take this off.

you like surprises.

58600 60810 Yeah. I already love the view.

A ring of fire... ♪

115490 117242 I didn't even know
this place was open yet.

118743 119911 and I got us on the list
for opening night.

I'm dressed all right?

140223 144811 ♪ And it burns, burns, burns
The ring of fire ♪

183808 185518 Ah, come on. We can fit you in.

Some fun facts about
the Sky View Tower.

226768 230980 It's 494 feet tall
and weighs over 9,000 tons.

234943 237570 And even more impressive,
the entire project

237654 240156 was completed five months
ahead of schedule.

301843 305054 but we're already over capacity
for opening night.

306681 308141 If you wouldn't mind
just stepping aside.
309267 311519 I worked it out with Jake.

311602 312770 Is he here?
I could speak with--
312854 316232 We let Jake go this morning.

a very important man,

322697 324365 um, but maybe you could
help me out...

331039 332540 But I'm sorry,
I can't help you.

334083 336961 Oh, Mr. Fuller!
How nice to see you.
337045 338796 We have a lovely table for you.

376292 378378 I've just never been
this high up before.

380254 381672 I'm so sorry.
This night's turning into
such a disaster.

381756 382757 I really wanted it
to be perfect.
409200 412745 ♪ Like a star up in the blue ♪

444026 447405 ♪ And I tumbled from the sky ♪

at dinner,

581414 583624 but seeing as
we have this view...

590631 592675 Oh, I'm so sorry.
Of course. Yeah.

610568 613779 Iris, I want to spend
the rest of my life with you.

638471 639764 I'm the luckiest guy
in the world.

642975 644852 Are you kidding me?

646771 647855 We're going to start a family.

895895 898188 Out of my way Children first!

924298 925591 Please. I need to get
to the controls.

932806 936352 Please, sir. Step back!
We're already over capacity!
1148564 1150023 All right, that's it for today.

1150107 1152317 We'll start prepping
for the final next week.

1170711 1173255 [Paul's voice echoes]
We're going to start a family.

1173338 1175883 [guard]
Don't throw that penny.
It could kill somebody.

1186268 1187978 Oh, this dream
is ruining my life.
1192983 1194443 God, I'm not getting any sleep.
1197404 1199907 Um, can I tell you something?

1204161 1207497 So, the woman in my dream.
Her name is Iris, right?
1211376 1214838 I think I'm dreaming about her.

1216423 1218050 Yeah. The thing is,
I never even met her.

1218133 1220093 I don't even know
if she's alive.

1221970 1225432 either go home
and find out about Grandma
1225515 1226975 and hope that stops the dreams.

1227059 1231939 Or stay here and die
in your sleep for real.

1283407 1284825 -Yeah, me, too.
-I missed you so much.
1286201 1287744 Oh, so great to see you.

1287828 1290122 -Thank you, thank you.
-Let me take that for you.

1290205 1293375 Hey, sorry. Charlie took
your room a while ago,
1293458 1295127 and my files are in his room,

1295210 1297546 so I made up
the pullout for you.

1299131 1301216 Yeah, yeah. No, that sounds
totally fine.

1301300 1305053 Uh, hey, do we still have
that box of Mom's old stuff?

1305137 1309433 It had, uh, some photos,
like an address book
1310726 1312185 Uh, why do you want that?
1312269 1313895 Oh, it's not a big deal.

1313979 1315772 I just thought I saw it
lying around here somewhere.

1321528 1324614 Okay, this is going to sound
really, really weird,

1326450 1328952 I just need to find
Mom's mom, Iris.

1336543 1338503 And, you know,
I got rid of those boxes
1338587 1341340 years ago, after your mom left.

1345177 1349348 Um, "Hi, Stef. How are you?
It's so nice to see you."
1351516 1353310 Uh, I'm going to the cousins.

1353393 1355937 Whoa. Now? Look, your sister
just got home.

1357314 1358815 Actually, you know what?
I can drive you.

1358899 1360650 I was wanting
to see them anyways.

1362194 1364321 Hey. If you're going
to see your cousins,

1364404 1367282 please don't talk about Iris
to Uncle Howard.

1380754 1382672 I'm trying to talk to you.
What's your problem?

1384633 1386843 You haven't said anything
this entire time.

1391306 1393683 I mean, you only
come home for holidays.

1393767 1395727 Okay, I have to
tell you something.

1395811 1397854 But you have to promise
not to tell Dad.

1404903 1406488 That's not...
I mean, you're in college.

1406571 1408740 Okay, can you just promise me
you won't tell Dad?

1408824 1411660 -Why would I tell Dad?
-It's serious, Charlie.

1432973 1435434 What? Charlie, stop laughing!
If I don't get my grades up...

1435517 1437394 -It's kind of a big
moment for me.
-Stop!

1442524 1444234 -Miss Valedictorian
is failing out of school.
-Charlie, it's not funny.

1444317 1446361 If I don't get my grades up,
I will lose my scholarship.
1454911 1456455 Every time I close my eyes,

1456538 1459958 I have this same recurring
nightmare about Iris.

1464504 1466256 I mean, it has
to mean something.

1470760 1473472 I dreamed a hot dog
ate me last night.

1473555 1475599 -What? That is...
-Like the hot dog
was eating me.

1485567 1486526 -We'll find him.
-Just move a little bit.

1487944 1489070 It's an online match.
Are you serious?
1489154 1490280 I have to look under this.

1490363 1491740 Can you do me a kindness?
Fuck off.

1497871 1499456 -When was the last time
you saw him?
-Wait, who's Paco?

1501958 1504252 Oh, my gosh.
Hey, can you help us look?

1504336 1506171 And just watch your feet,
where you're stepping.

1507756 1509633 I just... I got to talk
to your dad first.

1511051 1513303 Oh, dude, she's flunking
out of school.

1519768 1522354 -Oh. But look who's down here.
-Hey, Julia.

1522437 1523647 -Oh, my gosh. I'm so sorry...
-How you been?

1527484 1529945 So, wait, how did
the promposal with Jenny go?

1530028 1532280 -Dude, she said yes.
-Oh, my God. Stop.

1535951 1537994 Oh, he met her
in junior lifeguards.

1540956 1542874 I didn't know you
were doing junior lifeguards.

1542958 1544459 -You didn't tell me that.
-Okay, so what
are you going to wear?

1544543 1546878 [Charlie] Uh, I'm just going
to keep it simple.

1549130 1551049 -[Charlie] But with,
like, a fun bowtie.
-[Julia] Yeah, yeah, yeah.

1560016 1561476 -How long are you here for?
-Uh, not long.

1563311 1565188 Yeah. Yeah, he's out back.
I'll get him.

1572404 1574322 You look a little tired.
Is everything okay?

1579828 1581580 Oh, so good to see you.
Hey, are you hungry?

1581663 1582706 I was just about
to make some lunch.

1584332 1585709 I came here because
I wanted to talk to you

1588044 1590171 I know you don't
like to talk about her--

1592716 1595176 It's just that
I've been having this
1601850 1603143 Okay, but the weird thing is

1603226 1605186 I've been dreaming
about a real place

1607147 1609316 It was, like, a restaurant
called the Sky View.

1614154 1615989 Did... did Iris tell you
about it? Uh...

1616072 1618658 What did she say?
Did she say anything?
1618742 1620201 Maybe if I could talk to her--

1621745 1623455 Oh, Stef is dreaming
about Grandma Iris.

1623538 1625749 -Ooh, Psycho Granny?
-I thought she was dead.

1630503 1632714 is a very deeply
disturbed woman.
End of story.

1632797 1634758 Look, if I could
just talk to her,
then maybe...

1634841 1636301 maybe I can get
these dreams to stop.

1637886 1639596 I don't get it. What happened
that was so bad?
1639679 1640764 For one thing, she's the reason

1640847 1642891 that your mother
is so screwed up.

1642974 1644392 -What?
-Look, I just don't want to
talk about this anymore, okay?

1644476 1646603 Uncle Howard, please.
I just need to know.

1657322 1658865 She... she wouldn't
let us go to school.
1658948 1661284 She locked us inside the house.

1661368 1663787 She obsessed about
all the horrific ways
1665121 1667165 And eventually it got so bad,

1670835 1672754 and they took your mother
and I away from her.

1674923 1676549 She tracked us
all through foster care,
1676633 1678593 and when the kids were born,

1678677 1681471 she started sending us
these horrible letters

1683139 1685225 and these disturbing pictures
of dead bodies.

1685308 1688144 [Brenda] We had to move
so she couldn't
contact us anymore.

1693149 1695443 Do you still have
any of those letters, though?

1702659 1706705 That woman is a sick
and dangerous person.

1706788 1709791 And for your well-being
and your safety...
1709874 1711126 stay the hell away from her.

1720885 1722971 I'm sure he'd love to be
in the living room right now.

1723054 1724764 -Wait, in here?
-[Charlie] He was
in the pantry.

1724848 1726015 -[Erik] Come on, guys.
Let's go.
-[Bobby] Chill, bro.
1726099 1727600 How did he even get in there?
1728518 1729602 I need you to help me.

1731438 1734149 You heard your uncle.
Just let it go.

1738611 1741030 My whole life is falling apart
because of this dream.

1741114 1742949 And not only that,
I feel like...
1743032 1744492 I feel like I'm losing my mind.

1744576 1746619 Please, you are the only
person who can help me.

1747996 1749706 if I put you in touch
with Iris.

1759632 1762260 do not look
in the bottom drawer
1864529 1867198 I'm here to see Iris Campbell.

1868783 1871494 Uh... Uh, yeah.
Yes, I did, but...

1871578 1874664 Then get the fuck out of here!
No visitors.
1887260 1888678 It's not you I'm afraid of.
2009424 2011300 I can see your mother in you.

2025732 2027900 Getting me to let my
guard down. [laughs]

2048755 2051132 She, uh...
She left when I was 10,

2051215 2053885 so we don't...
we don't see her anymore.

2058681 2060850 But you saw my letters.
That's why you're here, right?

2065688 2067774 I've been dreaming
about the Sky View.

2070443 2072153 Yeah, every single night
for the past two months.
2074280 2075990 In it, you're on a date,

2077825 2080328 and there's an explosion
and then you--
2090755 2092799 Years ago, at the Sky View...
2092882 2095635 I got a glimpse into the future

2095718 2097470 and saw what Death
was about to do.

2102809 2104060 I was going to do this
at dinner,

2104143 2105895 but seeing as
we have this view...
2112443 2113945 Oh, I'm so sorry. Of course.

2116572 2118116 [Paul] These past few years
have been absolutely magical.
2118199 2120952 And that's all because of you.

2129627 2131504 No, the whole building
is going to come down.

2138678 2141055 -Give it to me!
-[Paul] What are you doing?

2141139 2142765 What the fuck
is wrong with you?

2148813 2150565 -♪ You know you make me wanna ♪
-♪ Shout ♪

2150648 2151482 -♪ Kick my heels up and ♪
-♪ Shout ♪

2153818 2155403 -♪ Throw my head back and ♪
-♪ Shout ♪

2164912 2167707 Everyone needs to get off
the dance floor!
2167790 2169167 The glass is about to break.

2180928 2183931 [Iris] I saved a lot of
lives that night.

2184015 2185766 Lives that were never
meant to be saved.

2206621 2209373 But Death doesn't like it
when you fuck with his plans.

2209457 2211042 So, over the years,
he came back

2211125 2214003 and he killed everyone
who was there that night.

2218257 2219967 Wait a minute.
I'm sorry. Did you...
2220051 2221802 Did you say Death came back?

2221886 2224513 He's a relentless
son of a bitch.

2224597 2226432 Won't stop until
he finishes the job.

2226515 2229352 But I taught myself
how to see him coming.

2232188 2234607 I've been keeping him
at bay for years now.
2236359 2238110 But now he's got me. Cancer.

2244617 2246494 Wait, that's when
I started having my dream.

2248204 2250998 Okay, but why am I dreaming
about what you saw?

2251082 2253584 Maybe my cancer passed
my premonition onto you.

2253668 2256170 Maybe it's fate's demented
sense of humor.

2257755 2260174 What matters is that
when the universe speaks,

2285241 2287410 He thinks I'm distracted
because you're here.

2288869 2290788 I have to teach you
everything in this book.

2290871 2293582 It'll take some time
to learn the basics,

2293666 2295334 -so you'll need to stay here.
-Stay here?

2296919 2299005 I haven't stepped out there
in 20 years.
2299088 2301048 In here, we can be safe.

2313477 2315271 I... I have to get
back to school,

2315354 2317440 but, you know, I'll come back
and I'll visit.

2317523 2320318 No, I'm sick!
I won't be alive that long.
2323654 2326699 Death is coming for our family.
2332538 2335041 Uh, I think I made a mistake.

2335124 2337918 I think it was probably
just a dream.

2338002 2340129 No, wait.
At least take the book.

2370076 2372870 Look, I'm sorry.
I shouldn't have come here.

2375206 2376624 It will show you everything
you need to know

2414453 2416997 Hey, Stef. Her face really
explode right in front of you?

2421001 2422545 It's my bad, Stef.
I'm just curious.
2424505 2427967 Hey. How are you holding up?

2434223 2435766 I never...
I never should've went there.

2438185 2441021 I'm so sorry you had
to go through that.

2445192 2446819 She said something to me
before she died.

2446902 2448737 She said Death was coming
for our family.

2456871 2458247 I just didn't think
she'd show up. I...

2502791 2504126 If she's going
to Uncle Howard's house,
then I'm not.
2504210 2505836 You can get a ride with Dad.

2505920 2507296 Uh... [scoffs] You're not even
going to talk to her?

2509089 2510883 You don't remember her
like I do.

2514303 2517181 and now she rolls in here
after all these years

2517264 2518724 and wants to act
like nothing happened?

2530194 2532863 I tried calling you
so many times, and nothing.

2532947 2534532 Same with Julia.
You used to be best friends.

2538577 2540704 I've just been distracted
the last couple of months

2543541 2546001 It's been like this
ever since you left.

2546085 2548546 You're mad at Mom,
but you haven't
been around either.
2628250 2631545 ♪ I was tired of my lady ♪
2644933 2646560 ♪ I read the paper in bed ♪

2650064 2651732 Now you got it.
Watch out for splinters.
2671001 2674630 Come here. So glad you made it.

2674713 2676465 You know, I didn't think you
were actually going to come.

2679510 2681178 Hey, everybody!
Come on! Come on over!

2699196 2701865 [scoffs] Are you trying
to kill my brother?

2706036 2707871 You know,
the most important thing
is that you're here, so...

2720968 2723637 You don't get to pick
the one you get...

2723721 2726348 just got to love
the one that you got.

2730894 2733689 she lived alone
until the day that she died.

2733772 2737067 And her death should
be a reminder to all of us

2738652 2740487 and spend the time
that we have together.

2743490 2745033 Because we're not
going to get any back.

2766889 2769600 Oh, my God.
There was a bug in there.

2797044 2798629 -I got it.
-I don't think you've got it.

2804009 2806136 Actually, I'm starting
a new lifeguarding job.

2852683 2854560 [Darlene] Have a seat.
Take a load off.

2860148 2862693 It's quite the setup
you've got here.

2862776 2866071 Well, I wanted the kids
to have a happy childhood.

2868866 2870033 You're not talking
about us, are you?

2888343 2891305 It looks like
a house key to me.

2891388 2893056 Come on. You know
we've got the spare room.

2895017 2895893 And it's got to be better than
bouncing around trailer parks.

2904109 2905694 I don't think
this is a good idea.

2905777 2907863 It's never too late
for a second chance.
2921793 2923545 Pick up, pick up. Come on.

2925380 2926965 [Bobby] Okay, wait,
you bounce me
or I bounce you?

2960457 2963585 Stop stalling.
What's the worst thing
that could happen?

2963669 2965212 All right. Here we go.
Watch out.

2982020 2983230 -[Howard] Let's do it.
-[Bobby] Stay away
from that edge.
3022227 3023603 I'm glad you decided to come.

3059514 3063143 Neither shall there
be mourning nor pain.

3063226 3066021 And he shall wipe away
every tear from their eyes.
3067314 3068523 And death shall be no more.

3133004 3135507 I found these papers
in Iris' book.

3138301 3140887 for the people who were
at the Sky View

3140971 3144057 on the night that
Iris had her premonition.

3144141 3145725 Each one of these people
went on to die
3149521 3151106 they all died in the same order

3152899 3155318 Hundreds of people were
supposed to die that night,

3159072 3162951 So, Death came back for them
one by one.

3164619 3167622 it took years for Death
to get to all of them.
3167706 3170792 But eventually it got to Iris.

3170876 3173545 I mean, she was the last
to die in the premonition.
3173628 3175755 It was her and the little boy.

3179885 3183513 She single-handedly
held off Death for decades.

3186349 3188643 I don't think this is
the appropriate time for this.

3188727 3191188 Yeah, I mean,
none of this even has anything
to do with us, right?

3192647 3194107 No, it has everything
to do with us.

3194191 3196443 I mean, because
Death took so long

3196526 3198320 to make its way through
the survivors,

3198403 3199821 these people went on
to have families.
3205160 3207746 I mean, don't you see this?

3210457 3213001 because we were never
supposed to exist.

3214628 3216713 everybody in this room
is on Death's "hit list"?

3219049 3221218 No, no, no.
Dad and Aunt Brenda are safe

3221301 3223261 because they're not
part of Iris' bloodline.

3226806 3230060 Death makes its way
down each branch by age.

3230143 3231853 So because Uncle Howard
was the oldest,

3236024 3238693 Then it'll go for Julia,
then Bobby.
3239819 3241279 Then it'll come for our branch,

3241363 3244783 starting with Darlene,
then me, then Charlie.

3253416 3254918 I mean, you're turning
our dad's death

3255001 3257337 into some kind of fucked-up
conspiracy theory.

3257420 3258880 -What is wrong with you?
-No, no, no.

3262884 3266054 Stop! I can't listen to this
for one more minute.

3267973 3271142 has caused enough
pain and suffering
for this family.

3273103 3274729 -please just listen.
-For God's sake,
leave it alone.

3274813 3276439 [Stefani] Okay, in Iris' book,
she mentions somebody

3285198 3286700 -Let me take care of this.
-[Julia] Come on, Bobby.

3288451 3289869 -[Marty] Brenda, I'm sorry.
-[Stefani] No, no, no.

3319274 3323069 [Darlene] I know how convincing
all of this can be.

3327615 3330410 I know Iris taught you
all of this.

3330493 3333079 Don't let my mom's beliefs
derail your life...
3334122 3335332 the same way they did mine.

3339294 3341838 Thank you so much
for that advice,

3341921 3343673 but I really don't
need a mom anymore.

3354017 3355977 -This is going to pinch,
all right? You ready?
-Mmm-hmm.

3366780 3369532 Ready to hit the club.
Need you to lock up.

3369616 3371159 And don't touch
any of my liquor.

3371242 3373203 No, no, you didn't say
anything about locking up.

3373286 3374996 -Yeah, yeah, yeah.
-You didn't say shit
about closing, dude!
3377207 3378666 [Erik] I hope you burn in hell!

3384381 3385799 I come in as a favor
to that asshole,
3385882 3387884 and now he wants me to lock up.

3397977 3401856 Like and subscribe
and all the... things.

3491779 3495658 ♪ Or your face
As you were leaving ♪

3495742 3498912 ♪ But I guess
That's just the way ♪

3502707 3508880 ♪ And now it's only fair
That I should let you know ♪

3557011 3559597 ♪ Or your face
As you were leaving ♪

3570733 3575613 ♪ But in your eyes
your sorrow shows ♪

3586332 3590211 ♪ I can't live
If living is without you ♪

3634047 3637091 ♪ I can't give
I can't give anymore ♪

3668706 3670041 I've been trying
to call Erik all night.

3671459 3673753 I don't know where he is.
I'm worried.
3675254 3676464 Well, have you heard from him?

3683513 3685807 I'm going over there.
I need to check on him.

3697527 3699028 My friend just said
the tattoo parlor

3709914 3712041 Oh, yeah, no,
of course it's you.

3717630 3719173 We heard about the fire.
We thought you were dead.

3721134 3722677 Oh, my God. Are you okay?
I was so worried about you.

3722760 3724762 Yeah. The firefighters said
I was lucky as fuck

3724846 3726305 that I was wearing
that leather jacket.

3729809 3731602 -[Stefani] What is this?
-Oh, yeah, check it out.

3738735 3739736 You were blowing up my phone
like a goddamn stalker.
3739819 3741195 What did you want me to do?

3741279 3743239 No, I don't get it.
You should be dead.

3748327 3750872 Maybe Death's not actually
coming for our family.

3768973 3770183 Just because Death
didn't kill you last night,

3778191 3779567 Is it going to move
on its own, Stef?
